translations.translation: There will be but one Great Blast,
It will only be a single blast,
Surely they will need no more than a single stern blast,
However, it will only take a single blast
So that is not but a single shout.
But it will be only a single Zajrah.
But it shall be only a single cry,
But it shall be only a single scare,
Surely it will need but one shout,
But all it will take is a single blast,
It will be only one scaring shout,
Yet it will be only a single shout,
But verily, it will be but a single (Compelling) Cry,
But only, it will be a single Zajrah [shout (i.e., the second blowing of the Trumpet)]. (See Verse 37:19).
But it will be only a single blow,
But it will be only a single nudge.
Indeed, it will be but one shout,
[79:13] God, exalted be He, says: But it, the Aftershock, which will be followed by the Resurrection, will be only a single blast, and so when it is blasted:
And so Allah said: (Surely it will need but one shout) one blow which does not require a second one, and this is the blow of the resurrection,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ } معناه صَيحةٌ واحدةٌ وهي النَفخةُ الآخرةُ

translations.translation: And His saying, {one blast} means one shout, and that is the final blowing of the trumpet.
